message.login.validation: Please enter a username or account.
message.login.failure: Login failed. Please check your ID or password.
message.workspace.create.success: The workspace has been created. We are currently testing for a normal service and it will take about 10 to 15 minutes.
message.incorrect.access.login.please: Invalid token value. Please log in again.
message.login.wrong: Login failed. Please check your ID and password.
message.workspace.vm.add.success: [{count}] desktop virtual machine creation requests completed.
message.workspace.user.add.ok: You have added [{count}] users to the workspace.
message.workspace.user.add.fail: Failed to add user to workspace.
message.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete it?
message.workspace.user.delete.ok: You have deleted [{count}] users from your workspace.
message.workspace.user.delete.fail: Failed to delete [{count}] users from workspace.
message.vm.status.update: The state of the desktop virtual machine has changed.
message.vm.status.update.fail: Failed to change state of desktop virtual machine.
message.name.dupl: Duplicates an existing name. Please enter a different name.
message.workspace.user.add.dupl: [{count}] of the selected users have already been registered.
message.workspace.delete.existvm: There are workspaces with virtual machines. The selected [{count}] workspaces were not deleted.
message.login.wrong.400: Failed to communicate with controller server. Please contact the administrator.
message.login.wrong.401: Failed to generate settlement token when logging in. Please contact the administrator.
message.vm.status.start.ok: [{count}] desktop virtual machines have completed startup requests.
message.vm.status.restart.ok: [{count}] desktop virtual machines have completed restart requests.
message.vm.status.stop.ok: The request to stop [{count}] desktop virtual machines has been completed.
message.vm.status.delete.ok: Your request to delete [{count}] desktop virtual machines has been completed.
message.user.vm.allocated.fail: Failed to assign users to [{count}] desktops.
message.user.vm.unlock.ok: Users unassigned to [{count}] desktop virtual machines.
message.user.vm.unlock.fail: Failed to deallocate users to [{count}] desktop virtual machines.
message.status.check.moldapi: Check Server: Check Works API > Check Mold API
message.status.check.dc: Check Server: Check Works API > Check Mold API > Check Controller Server
message.status.check.ad: Check Server: Check Works API > Check Mold API > Check Controller Server > Check Directory Server
message.status.check.desc.all.ok: Desktop service configuration is complete. Please log in to Works Portal.
message.status.check.desc.dc.fail: The controller server is not responding.
message.status.check.desc.ad.fail: The directory server is not responding.
message.workspace.test: We are currently creating a Test VM and checking whether normal communication with the controller server and directory server is in progress. The test is performed for about 10 to 15 minutes, and the final check is normal. Test VM will be deleted automatically. Please wait.
message.account.file.upload.confirm: After uploading the file, please check that all items are entered correctly.
message.account.file.upload.description: If the data does not appear in the table below, the file format or data was not entered correctly, so please rewrite and upload.

tooltip.workspace.template: Templates to use in your workspace

label.title: User Title
input.workspace.name: Input workspace name(except Korean, 7 characters or less).
input.workspace.description: Input workspace description.(32 characters or less)
input.user.password: Input the user password(7 or more letters, numbers, and special characters).
input.user.title: Input user user title.
input.user.phone: Please format your phone number(including numbers and '-').
input.file.upload.dragdrop: Upload a file by clicking or dragging it to this area.
search.name: Search Name.
